instructions: In a pot, heat the oil and add all the ingredients except for the fish and water. Sauté for about 5 minutes.
Add the water, fish, and lemon juice. Optionally, you can add sliced potatoes.
notes: Harimi is a traditional Tunisian-Djerban Jewish dish, often enjoyed for its rich flavors and aromatic spices. It can be served with a side of rice or bread to soak up the delicious sauce.
